argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nfpo.r | |- F/_ x R |
| 2 |  | nfpo.a | |- F/_ x A |
| 3 |  | #P_df-so | |- ( R Or A <-> ( R Po A /\ A. a e. A A. b e. A ( a R b \/ a = b \/ b R a ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_nfpo | |- F/ x R Po A |
| 5 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x a |
| 6 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x b |
| 7 | 5, 1, 6 | #P_nfbr | |- F/ x a R b |
| 8 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ x a = b |
| 9 | 6, 1, 5 | #P_nfbr | |- F/ x b R a |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_nf3or | |- F/ x ( a R b \/ a = b \/ b R a ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_nfral | |- F/ x A. b e. A ( a R b \/ a = b \/ b R a ) |
| 12 | 2, 11 | #P_nfral | |- F/ x A. a e. A A. b e. A ( a R b \/ a = b \/ b R a ) |
| 13 | 4, 12 | #P_nfan | |- F/ x ( R Po A /\ A. a e. A A. b e. A ( a R b \/ a = b \/ b R a ) ) |
| 14 | 3, 13 | #P_nfxfr | |- F/ x R Or A |
